title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1586/95 of 30 June 1995 amending Regulation (EEC) No 776/78 on the application of the lowest rate of refund on exports of dairy products
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1586/95 of 30 June 1995 amending Regulation (EEC) No 776/78 on the  application of the lowest rate of refund on exports of dairy products
THE  COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Regulation (EEC) No 776/78 is hereby amended as follows:
1.  in Article 2 'Zone E` is replaced by 'destination No 400`;
2.  in Annex II:
-  in the column headed 'Destination` 'Zone E` is replaced by 'No 400`,
-  the reference to 'Regulation (EEC) No 1098/68` in footnote 1 is replaced by 'Regulation (EC) No  3079/94`.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in  the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 June 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
